entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening except a few wet flurries over higher terrain. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to near valley bottom this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:58 PM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon except a few wet flurries over higher terrain. Snow level 1100 metres. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:58 PM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening except a few wet flurries over higher terrain. Clearing in the evening. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to near valley bottom in the evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:58 PM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023
